title: what comes in a legacy chest
body: I know you can get all the legacy skins currently in the store, but can you get skins like mighty jax and worlds skins??

replies.body: I wish skins like PAX Jax were available.. As a huge fan of Jax it would be so nice if i had it in my collection.{{champion:24}}
Out of curiosity, is Rusty Blitzcrank going to be available anytime soon?
They actually removed Rusted Blitz when they added chromas. If you owned him at the time you got an rp refund for the price of it if I remember correctly.

Some skins are only available during special events, like championship skins per the[ legacy skins ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins)guide.  Looking over that list, it appears that mighty jax is for winter games which is different than snowdown.  

You may be able to find him if you're lucky through mystery gifts or hextech crafting, though.  Because they are legacy skins, you should be able to find them in the snowdown legacy chest.  Good luck!
That link to the legacy skins guide seems to just go back to this thread. Maybe you meant https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins
